activities.name: Salzburg Easter Festival
activities.description: A renowned classical music festival featuring performances by the Vienna Philharmonic and other international artists.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held annually around Easter, celebrating classical music.
activities.booking_tips: Book tickets well in advance as performances often sell out.

activities.name: Mirabell Gardens
activities.description: Famous for its beautiful, blooming gardens and the setting for 'The Sound of Music' film scenes.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring is perfect for enjoying the colorful blooms.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required; visit early to avoid crowds.

activities.name: Salzburg Museum
activities.description: Offers exhibitions on the cultural history of Salzburg, with a special focus on local heritage.
activities.seasonal_notes: Great for rainy spring days.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online to skip the queue.

activities.name: Mozart's Birthplace Tour
activities.description: Visit the house where Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart was born, featuring original instruments and period furniture.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring offers comfortable weather for exploring the historic district.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online to avoid long lines, especially during peak hours.

activities.name: Salzburg Cathedral
activities.description: Explore the stunning baroque cathedral with its impressive architecture and rich history.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring light illuminates the cathedral's interior beautifully.
activities.booking_tips: Visit early to avoid crowds and attend a morning mass for a unique experience.

activities.name: Salzburg Zoo
activities.description: Home to over 1,200 animals in a natural setting, perfect for families and nature lovers.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring is ideal for viewing newborn animals and enjoying mild weather.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online for discounts and arrive early to see animals at their most active.

activities.name: Salzburg Fortress Concerts
activities.description: Experience classical music performances in the historic setting of Hohensalzburg Fortress.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring concerts offer a magical atmosphere in the historic venue.
activities.booking_tips: Book tickets well in advance and consider a package that includes the fortress tour.

activities.name: Salzburg Botanical Gardens
activities.description: Explore diverse plant collections and themed gardens in a peaceful setting.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring brings vibrant blooms and fresh greenery to the gardens.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required, but bring a camera for spring photography.

activities.name: Salzburg Festival
activities.description: One of the world's most prestigious music and drama festivals, featuring opera, concerts, and theater.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held from late July to August, attracting visitors from around the globe.
activities.booking_tips: Tickets sell out fast; book as early as possible.

activities.name: Hiking in Untersberg
activities.description: Explore the trails of Untersberg Mountain for stunning views of Salzburg and the Alps.
activities.seasonal_notes: Ideal in summer for clear skies and pleasant weather.
activities.booking_tips: Wear appropriate hiking gear and check weather conditions.

activities.name: Salzach River Cruise
activities.description: A leisurely cruise along the Salzach River, offering picturesque views of Salzburg.
activities.seasonal_notes: Perfect for a sunny summer day.
activities.booking_tips: Book tickets online to secure your preferred time slot.

activities.name: Hellbrunn Palace and Trick Fountains
activities.description: Visit the summer residence of the archbishops, famous for its trick fountains and beautiful gardens.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer is the best time to experience the trick fountains and gardens.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online and join a guided tour for the full experience.

activities.name: Salzburg Open-Air Concerts
activities.description: Enjoy classical music performances in various outdoor venues throughout the city.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer evenings provide the perfect setting for outdoor concerts.
activities.booking_tips: Bring a blanket or chair and arrive early to secure a good spot.

activities.name: Mirabell Palace Gardens
activities.description: Stroll through the famous gardens featured in 'The Sound of Music'.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer brings the gardens to full bloom.
activities.booking_tips: Visit early to avoid crowds and enjoy the morning light.

activities.name: Salzburg Beer Festival
activities.description: Celebrate local beer culture with traditional brews and Bavarian food.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer is the perfect time for outdoor beer festivals.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required, but bring cash for purchases.

activities.name: Salzburg Night Watchman Tour
activities.description: Experience a guided tour of the historic city center by lantern light.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer evenings are ideal for this atmospheric tour.
activities.booking_tips: Book in advance and wear comfortable walking shoes.

activities.name: Stiegl Brewery Tour
activities.description: Discover the brewing process of Austria's most famous beer and enjoy tastings.
activities.seasonal_notes: Ideal during cooler autumn days.
activities.booking_tips: Tours can be booked online or at the brewery.

activities.name: Sound of Music Tour
activities.description: Visit iconic filming locations of 'The Sound of Music' set against the backdrop of autumn foliage.
activities.seasonal_notes: The fall colors enhance the scenic beauty of the tour.
activities.booking_tips: Book in advance to ensure availability.

activities.name: Salzburg Autumn Market
activities.description: Experience local culture with stalls selling crafts, food, and seasonal produce.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn markets showcase regional specialties.
activities.booking_tips: No booking needed, but arrive early for the best selection.

activities.name: Salzburg Card Experience
activities.description: Explore multiple attractions with a convenient pass, including museums and transportation.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn is a great time to visit multiple indoor attractions.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase the card online and plan your itinerary in advance.

activities.name: Mozart Dinner Concert
activities.description: Enjoy a candlelit dinner with Mozart's music performed in period costume.
activities.seasonal_notes: Perfect for cozy autumn evenings.
activities.booking_tips: Reserve well in advance, especially for weekend performances.

activities.name: Salzburg Castle Tour
activities.description: Explore the historic Hohensalzburg Fortress with guided tours and exhibitions.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn offers comfortable weather for exploring the castle.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online and consider the funicular ride for convenience.

activities.name: Salzburg Wine Festival
activities.description: Sample local wines and enjoy traditional Austrian cuisine.
activities.seasonal_notes: Celebrate the autumn grape harvest.
activities.booking_tips: Bring cash for purchases and arrive early for the best selection.

activities.name: Salzburg Art Gallery
activities.description: View contemporary and classical art exhibitions in a modern setting.
activities.seasonal_notes: A great indoor activity for rainy autumn days.
activities.booking_tips: Check the exhibition schedule online before visiting.

activities.name: Salzburg Christmas Markets
activities.description: Traditional Christmas markets offering festive goods, crafts, and mulled wine.
activities.seasonal_notes: A must-visit for holiday cheer and unique gifts.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required, but weekends can be crowded.

activities.name: Skiing in the Alps
activities.description: Enjoy skiing and snowboarding in nearby alpine resorts.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter sports are a highlight of the cold season.
activities.booking_tips: Book ski passes and accommodation in advance.

activities.name: Hellbrunn Advent Magic
activities.description: A whimsical Christmas experience with light displays and festive activities at Hellbrunn Palace.
activities.seasonal_notes: The palace grounds transform into a winter wonderland.
activities.booking_tips: Tickets can be purchased at the entrance.

activities.name: Salzburg Advent Concerts
activities.description: Experience traditional Christmas music in historic venues.
activities.seasonal_notes: Perfect for getting into the holiday spirit.
activities.booking_tips: Book tickets early for popular performances.

activities.name: Salzburg Ice Skating
activities.description: Glide across the ice at various outdoor rinks throughout the city.
activities.seasonal_notes: A popular winter pastime for locals and visitors.
activities.booking_tips: Skate rentals are available on-site.

activities.name: Salzburg New Year's Concert
activities.description: Ring in the New Year with a special concert featuring classical music.
activities.seasonal_notes: A festive way to celebrate the New Year.
activities.booking_tips: Tickets sell out quickly; book months in advance.

activities.name: Salzburg Thermal Baths
activities.description: Unwind in warm thermal waters with views of the snowy landscape.
activities.seasonal_notes: Perfect for warming up during cold winter days.
activities.booking_tips: Book treatments in advance, especially on weekends.

activities.name: Salzburg Winter Festival
activities.description: Celebrate winter with cultural events, food, and entertainment.
activities.seasonal_notes: A great way to experience local winter traditions.
activities.booking_tips: Check the event schedule online for specific activities.
